verses.plain: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;

tokens.t: hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;

verses.plain: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;

tokens.t: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;

verses.plain: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.

tokens.t: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.

verses.plain: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.

tokens.t: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.

verses.plain: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the LORD fulfil all thy petitions.

tokens.t: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up

verses.plain: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.

tokens.t: saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.

verses.plain: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.

tokens.t: in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the

verses.plain: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.

tokens.t: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.

verses.plain: Save, LORD: let the king hear us when we call.

tokens.t: : let the king hear us when we call.

footnotes.text: defend…: Heb. set thee on an high place
accept: Heb. turn to ashes: or, make fat
his holy…: Heb. the heaven of his holiness
with…: Heb. by the strength of the salvation of
